languages.text: {n}Люди изумленно переглядываются, услышав неприглядную истину жизни. Радость испаряется, остается лишь горечь разочарования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Люди изумленно переглядываются, услышав неприглядную истину жизни. Радость испаряется, остается лишь горечь разочарования.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди изумленно переглядываются, услышав неприглядную истину жизни. Радость испаряется, остается лишь горечь разочарования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
"Simple folk, simple thoughts, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I regret that my performance has offended the Lord Captain's refined hearing. Please forgive my humble skill."
{n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
"Simple folk, simple thoughts, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I regret that my performance has offended the Lord Captain's refined hearing. Please forgive my humble skill."
{n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
{n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
{n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
{n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les spectateurs échangent des regards ébahis à l'énonciation de ce triste constat. Leur joie disparaît aussitôt pour céder la place à l'amertume de la déception.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les spectateurs échangent des regards ébahis à l'énonciation de ce triste constat. Leur joie disparaît aussitôt pour céder la place à l'amertume de la déception.{/n}

« À gens simples, simples pensées, Votre Seigneurie. Je regrette que ma performance ait autant heurté l'ouïe {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Veuillez pardonner mon piètre talent. »

languages.text: {n}El público intercambia miradas de sorpresa al oír un hecho tan desagradable sobre su realidad cotidiana. Su júbilo se evapora, dejando únicamente el amargo poso de la decepción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El público intercambia miradas de sorpresa al oír un hecho tan desagradable sobre su realidad cotidiana. Su júbilo se evapora, dejando únicamente el amargo poso de la decepción.{/n}

«Somos gente sencilla con pensamientos sencillos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Lamento que mi actuación haya ofendido el refinado gusto musical {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. Por favor, sepa disculpar mi falta de talento».

languages.text: {n}この受け入れがたい事実を聞いて、人々は衝撃のあまり顔を見合わせた。喜びは消え去り、失望の苦しさだけが残る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この受け入れがたい事実を聞いて、人々は衝撃のあまり顔を見合わせた。喜びは消え去り、失望の苦しさだけが残る。{/n}
「シンプルな人間達は、脳みそもシンプルです、陛下。私の演奏がロード・キャプテンの洗練されたお耳を汚してしまい申し訳ありません。どうかお許しください」

languages.text: {n}听到这个令人不快的命令之后，所有人都一脸震惊，面面相觑。欢快的气氛消失不见，残留的只有苦涩与失望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这个令人不快的命令之后，所有人都一脸震惊，面面相觑。欢快的气氛消失不见，残留的只有苦涩与失望。{/n}
“朴实的人，思想也会比较朴实，大人。我的表演冒犯了大人您的耳朵，我很抱歉，请原谅我笨拙的技艺。”

languages.text: {n}Die Leute sehen sich schockiert an, als sie diese unerfreuliche Tatsache hören.. Ihre Freude verschwindet und zurück bleibt bittere Enttäuschung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leute sehen sich schockiert an, als sie diese unerfreuliche Tatsache hören.. Ihre Freude verschwindet und zurück bleibt bittere Enttäuschung.{/n}
"Einfache Leute, einfache Gedanken, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bedauere, dass meine Vorstellung das feine Hörorgan des Lord Captain beleidigt hat. Bitte verzeiht mein bescheidenes Können."

languages.text: {n}İnsanlar, hayatın bu tatsız gerçeğini işitmelerinin ardından şaşkınlık içinde birbirlerine bakıyor. Neşeleri buhar olup havaya karışıyor. Geriye yalnızca hayal kırıklığının acı tadı kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people look at each other in shock upon hearing this unpalatable fact of life. Their joy evaporates, leaving only the bitterness of disappointment.{/n}
